job_tasks.phrase: shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role's involvement in strategic direction and future development within the business context of conversational AI.

job_tasks.phrase: make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on improving customer experience and operational efficiency, which are business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to designing and implementing a data architecture, a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist
job_tasks.justification: This indicates working with and improving existing AI models and conversational AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with LLMs and assessing their performance, which falls under model development and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This indicates working with and evaluating traditional ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data
job_tasks.justification: Data annotation is a crucial step in the model training process, directly related to modeling.
This explicitly mentions working with and integrating Large Language Models.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows
job_tasks.justification: This implies building, updating, and ensuring the functionality of AI-driven systems, which is software development.

job_tasks.phrase: innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling
job_tasks.justification: This suggests developing and enhancing software applications related to conversational AI.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and enhance, and innovate our conversational solutions
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the ongoing development and improvement of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and integration of new software platforms and functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: automating the data and ml processes used within the team
job_tasks.justification: Automating processes related to data and ML workflows is a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
job_tasks.justification: Pipelines for evaluation and potentially deployment/monitoring are MLOps related.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
job_tasks.justification: Pipelines for evaluation and potentially deployment/monitoring are MLOps related.

soft_skills.phrase: part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants
working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers
enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI
make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner
innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes working with LLMs, implementing pipelines for LLM prompt evaluation, and migrating to LLM-powered platforms like MS Copilot. This aligns directly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on generative models and the surrounding software development.
